songs.title: IWATCHEDHIMDROWN (Intro)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Ski Mask the Slump God & XXXTENTACION]
I can fly, I can
Yuh (Hey, me and Ski are in the booth)
Bitch (Together)
Bitch (Together)
Here's your bitch (Laughing)
Yuh, bitch 'em, getting 'em, mkay, ugh
Steven, you fat

[Verse 1: Ski Mask the Slump God]
(Hit it) Drop it, hit it, drop my hoe (My hoe)
And that bitch is Asian like she Code Lyoko (Code Lyoko)
Hit it, hit her, kendo
'Cause a nigga tryna Assassin Creed my flow (Creed my flow)
Aye, come get your bitch, she make me sick
All 'bout them D's, double-dutch on my dick
I can't complain, she get wet as a sink
Ski Mask, Jeff Gordon, I drift with the mink (Drift with the mink)
(Hmm) Raspberry, ride my dick, crashing shit
Her hands up like I ski-masked the bitch (Ski-masked the bitch)
Bittersweet, tastes like a xan' and shit (Xan' and shit)
Mean-mug your man like a daddy, shit (Daddy, shit)
Damage you, uh, package you, uh
Ship to your mom, let her handle you (Coughing, handle you)
X gon' act wild like he capping shit, uh (Capping shit)
Come for your blood like he repping shit (Repping shit)

[Verse 2: XXXTENTACION]
Grab your fucking face, put that on a curb
Eating gravel, mineral, not a nerd
I'ma numb him, blood him, Manny my curse
Watch his image become bloody with fur
Hear my doctor: "What he need?" "I don't know"
Reassuring someone's blood on my shirt
White tees, white folks, newscast
Screaming "Nigga, you fucked"
Watch how quick my motherfucking bullets rip
Jumped out clips, now, watch his body fucking dip
Slit my wrist just for release on DatPiff
Body-to-body, we dirty dance, throw a fit
Smash my face into the glass, I'm pissed
Wash my corpse into the bottom, I sit
All my pain and my neglect, I reaped
What I've sown, I need my throat slit quick, come (Come)
